documents.title: Employee Performance Scoring Overview
documents.content: Cloudora uses a transparent and fair performance scoring system. Scores are based on quality of work, task completion, discipline, communication, customer experience, and reliability.

documents.title: Performance Scoring Formula
documents.content: Performance Score = (Task Completion 30%) + (Quality 25%) + (Discipline 15%) + (Communication 15%) + (Team Behaviour 15%). Score ranges: 90+ = Excellent, 75–89 = Strong, 60–74 = Average, 40–59 = Needs Improvement, <40 = Critical.

documents.title: Performance Expectations
documents.content: Employees must: complete tasks on time, maintain quality, follow SOP, communicate clearly, update CRM, avoid errors, show professionalism, and collaborate with team members.

documents.title: Performance Rewards
documents.content: High performers receive: incentives, leadership opportunities, priority shifts, fast-track promotions, monthly recognition, and additional Genie assistance modules.
